testAddCard() - Method in class Part3.PlayerTest
Assert that addCard adds the correct card to the correct player's hands
testCheckForUno() - Method in class Part3.GameTest
Asserts that checkForUno only returns true if player has only 1 card in hand
testCheckForWinner() - Method in class Part3.GameTest
Assert that the bool isOver in game is only set true if a player has no cards left (i.e. a player wins)
testDraw() - Method in class Part3.DeckTest
Assert that draw() returns the card on top of the deck
testDrawTwo() - Method in class Part3.GameTest
Assert that a draw two card can only be played on a card of the same color or on another draw two card

testGetName() - Method in class Part3.PlayerTest

testIsEmpty() - Method in class Part3.DeckTest
Assert that isEmpty only returns true if the deck is empty
testIsLastCard() - Method in class Part3.DeckTest
Assert that isLastCard returns true only if there is one card left on the stack
testNumberCard() - Method in class Part3.GameTest
Assert that validPlayCheck returns true if a move is valid and false otherwise Assert that numberCard() works correctly (by playing valid or non-valid cards)
testNumberCardOnDraw_2() - Method in class Part3.GameTest
Assert that on a yellow plus two card, no other number card than a yellow one can be played
testNumberCardOnReverse() - Method in class Part3.GameTest
Assert that on a yellow reverse card, no other number card than a yellow one can be played
testNumberCardOnSkip() - Method in class Part3.GameTest
Assert that on a yellow skip card, no other number card than a yellow one can be played
testNumberCardOnWildCards() - Method in class Part3.GameTest
Assert that on a wild card where the color yellow was chosen, only a yellow card can be played
testParseCommands() - Method in class Part3.GameTest
Assert that the commands are parsed correctly
testParseNamesOfPlayers() - Method in class Part3.GameTest
Assert that the input for the name of a player is in a valid format
testParseNumberOfPlayers() - Method in class Part3.GameTest
Assert that only numbers between 2 and 10 are accepted as number of players
testRemoveAll() - Method in class Part3.DeckTest
Assert that after calling removeAll on the playDeck, the playDeck is empty afterwards
testRemoveAllCards() - Method in class Part3.PlayerTest
 
testReshuffle() - Method in class Part3.GameTest
Assert that after shuffling the deck of the played cards, the new draw deck has the size of the old play deck minus one (because the last played card stays on the played cards deck)
testReverse() - Method in class Part3.GameTest
Check that after a reverse card, the direction of the game actually changes
testSkip() - Method in class Part3.GameTest
Assert that a Skip card can only be played on a card of the same color, but not a draw two card
testWild() - Method in class Part3.GameTest
Assert that the wild card can be played after every card except for draw or wild draw
testWildDrawFour() - Method in class Part3.GameTest
Assert that a wild draw four card can be played on any other card
